title: Winter soup with farro and vegetables
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '3 carrots, peeled and chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '400g farro', '1 tablespoon vegetarian no-chicken base, or 2 vegetable stock cubes', '2 potatoes, peeled and chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas', 'salt and pepper to taste']
